recipesJson.name: Mango Peach Soda
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a bright and natural mango paired with yellow peach, infused into a lemon lime soda
Inspired by Staybert - Citrasperry Soda
https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/148968

reviews.text: This is going down an absolute treat. Made like for like bar the ws23. Fresh mango, peach, and an all round tropical soda. Almost gives a fizzy feel with the Flv Citrus Soda. Another great vape Mr,Walker
